description: '''Uwe H. Schmidt''' (born 27 August 1968), also known as '''Atom™''', '''Atom Heart''', or '''Señor Coconut''', is a German composer, musician and producer of [[electronic music]]. He was active in the development of electrolatino, electrogospel, and aciton music. In the nineties, Schmidt moved to [[Chile]] and developed part of his career there, adopting the alias Señor Coconut.
